entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 14 in a few localities. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Low minus 8 except minus 14 in a few localities. Forecast issued 8:59 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 8:59 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 8:59 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023
